name: Judgment Day (Turquoise Moon)
description:
This game has mild jump scares. 

Press space (or tap the screen for mobile) to turn your flashlight on and off. When you hear footsteps, turn your flashlight on to scare away the monsters. The flashlight's battery will slowly run out while it is on, survive for as long as you can. There is currently no way to win.

This was created for Round 6 of the GDKO Jam.

All the monsters are based off of the judges for the jam: Whateep , Sid Fish Games, HelperWesley, Marlin, & Icoso

Background Forest Image: pexels.com

Background Cricket Audio: Ambient Sounds

You can thank my mom for the scream at the end. :)
